ovdesc.p: This application can be used and configured to launch a portal valuaton session.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
The key to the launch request.
The segemenation scheme to be used in displaying the valuation. This overrides the Asset/Sub Asset/Group setup.
Allows the choice of the grouping method
The currency in which to display the valuation. Can be a valid currency, REF = Portfolio Ref CCY, LCL, Local Currency.
Should open orders be included in the valuation.
The valuation date which is to be retrieved. (This can be historical)
Should 0/nill positions be displayed in the valuation enquiries.
Which hierarchy should be used for valuation reporting.
The launch type to use for this session. This allows multiple launch types to be used.
